description: Reissue of Request for Standing Offers: This request for standing offers (RFSO) cancels and supersedes previous RFSO number W6896-23S055/A dated 2023-06-22 with a closing of 2023-07-10 at 02:00 PM EDT. AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-08-11 at 02:00 PM EDT. The Department of Nation Defence (DND) has a requirement to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision and material necessary for the inspection, testing, sampling, air monitoring and/or removal of asbestos materials from various buildings at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Shilo, Manitoba.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## Canada
**Request for Standing Offers**

### Tender Information
| Field | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Title | Asbestos and Mold Abatement |
| Solicitation Number | WS4055141766 |
| Reference | W6896-23S055.B |
| Publication Date | July 26, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | August 11, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT |
| Amendment | 1 |
| Tender Status | Cancelled |
| Valid Until | N/A |

### Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and material necessary for inspection, testing, sampling, air monitoring, and/or removal of asbestos materials from various buildings at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Shilo, Manitoba.

### Notice Notice Type
- This notice is a Request for Standing Offers.
- The method of procurement is Competitive Open Bidding.

### Selection Criteria
- This tender will be based on the Lowest Price.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity
This tender is relevant to the province of Manitoba.

### Tender Cancellation
This tender supersedes the previous RFSO number W6896-23S055/A, dated June 22, 2023, with a closing date of July 10, 2023.

### Contact Information
- Lau, Christopher (SPAC/PSPC) at [christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Notice URL
View the full notice at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16987523?extsite=MTY5ODc1MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16987523?extsite=MTY5ODc1MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) </br>
